description:
Anthropic just launched ‘Integrations’ for Claude that enables the AI to talk directly to your favourite daily work tools. In addition, the company has launched a beefed-up ‘Advanced Research’ feature for digging deeper than ever before. Starting with Integrations, the feature builds on a technical standard Anthropic released last year (the Model Context Protocol, or […]

The post Claude Integrations: Anthropic adds AI to your favourite work tools appeared first on AI News.
title: Claude Integrations: Anthropic adds AI to your favourite work tools
